title: Revision
description: Trait that applies revision information to a document. In the Arc ecosystem, many of these fields are populated in stories by the Story API.

revision_id.description: The unique id of this revision.

parent_id.description: The unique id of the revision that this revisions was branched from, or preceded it on the current branch.

branch.description: The name of the branch this revision was created on.

editions.description: A list of identifiers of editions that point to this revision.

user_id.description: The unique user id of the person who created this revision.

published.description: Whether or not this revision's parent story is published, in any form or place
